description: Joganki is a high-ranking member of The Third`s council. He`s collected and confident, but not overly so. Joganki has a strong interest in Honoka, and they seem to have some sort of history - but Honoka wants nothing to do with him. She grumbles and complains about his constant "interference"... yet Joganki still continues to keep a watchful eye on her from his lofty seat in Hyperius.
name: Joganki
